meanings.definition: The quality or state of being indissoluble.
meanings.sent1: The indissolubleness of their friendship was evident in their unwavering loyalty to each other.
meanings.sent2: The indissolubleness of the glue made it perfect for fixing broken ceramics.
meanings.sent3: The indissolubleness of the puzzle pieces made it impossible for the toddler to separate them.
meanings.sent4: The indissolubleness of the bond between the siblings was like a strong chain that could not be broken.
meanings.sent5: The indissolubleness of the marriage vows made their commitment unbreakable.

meanings.definition: The inability to be dissolved or separated.
meanings.sent1: The indissolubleness of the sugar in the water made it impossible to remove.
meanings.sent2: The indissolubleness of the rock formations in the cave fascinated the geologists.
meanings.sent3: The indissolubleness of the peanut butter and jelly sandwich stuck to the roof of his mouth.
meanings.sent4: The indissolubleness of the team's defense was like an impenetrable wall against their opponents.
meanings.sent5: The indissolubleness of the ancient artifact to its pedestal made it seem like a part of the structure itself.
